entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine SignalR functional test "closed with error or start fails if hub cannot be created" #44608
  • Replace outdated dependencies in Blazor Server project template #44606
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Consider searching for ROS<char> variants of TryParse in RDF #44603
  • Document migration process for SPA projects #44600
    8.0-MQ
  • Add a way to customize WebApplicationBuilder before Build is called #44599
  • Contribute an existing Sample related to invoking an external AuthZ service for further permissions check. #44598
  • [Templates] Update icons in our templates #44596
  • Add support for storing Encryption keys in Cosmos Db #44590
    Discussions
  • Why the constructor access level of "Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler" is "internal"? #44589
  • Blazor in WebComponent #44588
  • Blazor WASM not load LocalStorage or IndexedDB from IFrame #44587
  • JSInitializer.importInitializersAsync doesn't respect initializerArguments #44586

Closed

  • Flakiness in SignalR NPM functional tests #44607
  • ASP.NET Identity Core 2.2 - Suppress "There are no external services ..." #12303
    Backlog
  • .net 6 rc2 identity login page return 500 #38132
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #44563
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44585
  • CertificateFailedValidation event is not logging the ChainErrors as expected. #44484
    8.0-preview1
  • FallbackPolicy takes precedence over AuthorizeFilters added using Conventions #39930
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Flag for templates which uses an existing shared framework build #11814
    8.0-MQ
  • Blazor WASM with custom user roles on Azure B2C #29000
    8.0-MQ
  • Standardize a User/Role/Policy Manager in the Razor Page, MVC, Blazor Templates. #44584
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #44577
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44580
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #44581

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine SignalR functional test "closed with error or start fails if hub cannot be created" #44609
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Get rid of IsPublicRuntime, use AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed #44605
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed for helix #44604
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Skip test that times out in CI #44602
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44597
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/7.0] add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536 #44583
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix documentation for .AddIdentityResources() #44560
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix logging of certificate chain errors. #44503
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9fbb657` to `a9b2f04` #44593
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44505
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Use Path.GetTempFileName() for 600 Unix file mode #44477
    8.0-preview1
  • add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Uri StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44570
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Backport loc fixes #44576
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-templates

Updated

  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Add IPNetwork.Parse and TryParse #44573
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Improve MapGroup link generation test #44562
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
